EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CONFIRMATION OF YOUR ASSESSMENT
Dear {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Candidate_Name__c},
This is to confirm your group assessment with us on {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Date__c} at {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Start_time__c} until {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.End_time__c} at {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Venue__c} {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Venue_address__c}
The assessment will include various group activities so please wear smart/casual comfortable clothing. Please prepare two 'icebreaker games' to share: these are simple games to break the ice with a group about ten people which last for about three minutes. Click on the link below for directions to the assessment venue. {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Directions__c}
We look forward to meeting you!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge Network
